item.title: Upcoming Currency Change in Bulgaria
item.description: 📅 Starting January 1, 2026, Bulgaria will officially adopt the euro (EUR), replacing the Bulgarian lev (BGN). 🛒 App Store purchases and subscriptions will shift to euros, with proceeds from sales also converted. If BGN is currently selected for your bank in App Store Connect, it will change to EUR on December 1, 2025. 💼 Pricing for apps and In‑App Purchases will be updated based on a fixed conversion rate of 1.95583 BGN = 1 EUR. item.title: Get ready with the latest beta releases
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for developers! The beta versions of iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS 26.1, tvOS 26.1, visionOS 26.1, and watchOS 26.1 are now available. It’s important to confirm that your apps function correctly with these updates. To leverage new SDK features, use Xcode 26.0.1 for building and testing. Check the release notes for more details! 📲💻 #Apple #BetaRelease #AppDevelopment #Xcode #iOS26

item.title: App Store submissions now open for the latest OS releases
item.description: 🚀 App developers, good news! Submissions are now open for iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS Tahoe 26, tvOS 26, visionOS 26, and watchOS 26. Utilize Xcode 26 and the latest SDKs to create unique apps and games. Test your creations with TestFlight before submitting for review. Starting April 2026, ensure your submissions meet the required SDK standards for each platform. 📲 Learn more about the new requirements! #AppDevelopment #Apple #iOS26 #Xcode26 #TechNews

item.title: Hello Developer: September 2025
item.description: Get ready for an exciting design update! 🎨 Whether you’re an experienced developer or just starting out, discover resources to enhance your apps and games. Explore videos, downloads, and documentation. Additionally, you can sign up for one-on-one sessions focusing on machine learning and AI. Plus, meet the team behind the popular game, Hello Kitty Island Adventure! 🌟 #HelloDeveloper #AppDevelopment #GameDesign #MachineLearning #HelloKittyAdventure

item.title: Tax and Price Updates for Apps, In-App Purchases, and Subscriptions
item.description: 🌍 The App Store is adjusting prices for apps and in-app purchases due to recent tax and exchange rate changes. 📅 As of August 21, updates include new VAT rates in Estonia and Romania, along with a digital services tax removal in Canada. The Philippines and Vietnam have introduced new VAT and personal income tax rates for developers. 🔄 Starting September 8, pricing updates will occur for apps not using the Philippines or Vietnam as their base storefront.
